CustomField.formula: IF(DAY( Dispatch_Invoice_Date__c ) / 7 <= 1 , 1 , IF(DAY( Dispatch_Invoice_Date__c ) / 7 <= 2 , 2 , IF(DAY( Dispatch_Invoice_Date__c ) / 7 <= 3 , 3 , IF(DAY( Dispatch_Invoice_Date__c ) / 7 <= 4 , 4 , IF(DAY( Dispatch_Invoice_Date__c ) / 7 <= 5 , 5 , 0) ))))
CustomField.label: Week of the month
